metadata.title: Toe Pouches Silicone Gel Sock Pads Blister Pads Toe Guards and Toe Covers Topper Cover Protector Sleeve for Ball of Foot Metatarsal Ballet Pointe Cap Morton's Neuroma
features: 【TOE PROTECTION AND PAIN RELIEF】--- Take a step toward foot pain relief with WenTigDY Covered Toe Sleeves. Our comfortable gel sleeves are designed to protect and shield your toes, relieving pain from overlapping toes, bunions, blisters, tailor’s bunions, metatarsalgia, corns, calluses, surgery, and more!

【SOFT BREATHABLE GEL】--- Softer than silicone toe protectors, our gel blend is designed to provide maximum comfort and protection for uncomfortable toes and forefoot pain. The BreathEase Vents also ensure proper air flow, avoiding sweaty or unhappy toes - even with all-day wear. The gel is flexible, but durable, so you’ll always be covered (and you may just forget you have ‘em on). Plus, our sleeves are washable and reusable, ensuring long-lasting relief.

【GENTLE REALIGNMENT AND FOREFOOT CUSHIONING】--- Toe pain can ruin your day, or keep you from wearing your favorite shoes. Our Covered Toe Sleeves can help, providing soft toe cover while gently cushioning the forefoot. The gel toe caps gently separate the big toe, stopping toe rubbing and overlapping, and increasing comfort.

【WORKS WITH ANY CLOSED TOE SHOE】--- The perfect toe protection for women and men! Our sleeves have a one-size-fits-most design, that is perfect for nearly any closed-toe shoe. Great for work boots or heels, and carefully designed to fit snugly under socks and shoes. Banish the friction and discomfort from blisters and uncomfortable shoes!

【DESIGNED & GUARANTEED BY DOCTORS】--- As physicians, our top priority is your results, which means creating the best possible product for you. That’s why we stand by our products with the industry-leading Get Back To It Guarantee. If our Covered Toe Sleeves don’t provide relief in 30 days or less, we’ll find something that will or we’ll give you your money back.
description: Color:Toe Caps
Have large size shoes?
Have trouble wearing shoes?
Have foot probl and feel painful to wear shoes?
Toes and forefeet are easy to get calluses, corns, blisters?
Our gel toe cushions can do great help to solve these troubles, TAKE A STEP TOWARDS LESS PAIN:
-- Corns and Hammer Toes
-- Ingrown Toenails
-- Calluses and Blisters
-- Plantar fasciitis and Hallux valgus
-- Metatarsal pain and Broken Toes
-- Mortons neuroma
-- Bunions and Tailor's bunion.
Make you take every step less pain, more confidence.
Why choose our BALL of FOREFOOT PADS?
1. Super soft and stretchy, provide great cushioning for forefoot and quick feet pain relief.
2. With toes all enwrapped, it can buffer your toes from rubbing and blistering.
3. It's very comfortable and non-slip in shoes. Works better with fitting socks.
4. Works with most closed-toe shoes. Big toe separating from the other four toes makes it stay in place. Can be worn with socks or no hosiery in shoes.
5. Our half-sleeve foot pads cushion your forefoot while soft gel relieves pressure and provide support for callused feet.
How to wash:
Hand washes in cold water, then air dry, avoid sun exposure and fire.
It's recommended to change a new pair after 60 days at most.
Use with some baby powder to reduce feet sweat and sticky feeling.
